name: Zonk's Adventure
description:
WASD + Space to jump
or Left Stick + A to jump

This is a new 2D game i'm developing for a narrative game jam. I was inspired by Lonk's Adventure and wanted to make my own 2D Adventure game.

I plan to add more npcs, houses, dialogue and a few items to hold and interact with. If I get time, some background images and sky as well.

I plan to have several different endings, each ending will unlock a unique dialogue to go with it. Inspired heavily by Lonk's Adventure!
